content.rendered:
Since 2004 Jennifer has been a stellar talent within the Luxe team. A master specialist in women’s hair colour and a force in creative styling, Jen has gained a hugely loyal following. Jennifer has great understanding of what clients are looking for and her results are exceptional.

Having undertaken intensive educator training for Davines and being a Master colour artist for Wella, she brings finely honed technical ability and precise colouring techniques to her clients.”I love delivering classic with a little edge” she says.

Availability: Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday & Saturday.

excerpt.rendered: Jen is a master specialist in women’s hair colour and a force in creative styling, Jen has gained a hugely loyal following.
